column1: Drogoth the Dragon Lord is a non-canonical character in The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II and the sequel The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king. He is a playable character for the Orcs faction.
Drogoth is said to be the lord of all dragons after the death of Smaug. In the good campaign
column2: he serves Sauron in exchange for one of the Dwarven Rings of Power He can only be attacked by ranged units and siege weapons.

column1: Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II
